text: Hi, my name is Roger Edwards! I enjoy recording podcasts with varied individuals with stories to tell and who want to share them with the world! You'll find links to all of my different podcasts here as well as articles that I write about numerous topics! I have been doing this for a while and it has brought me great joy to spread these stories and to share ideas and lessons that maybe you haven't heard before! You can follow me on my socials below and I look forward to connecting with you!
